terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.aboutText1: GuardianChain is a digital platform that registers cryptographic hashes on the Polygon blockchain for proof of existence purposes.
terms.aboutText2: GuardianChain does not store user documents. Files are processed only to generate a hash and are immediately discarded.
terms.eligibilityText: This service is intended for individuals 18 years or older.
terms.natureText: GuardianChain provides blockchain timestamp registration only. It does not replace notary services or provide legal advice.
terms.paymentText: All payments are processed via Stripe and are non-refundable after blockchain registration is completed.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.noStore: GuardianChain does not store user documents.
privacy.purposeText: Data is used solely for certificate delivery and technical operation.
refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.text1: Due to the irreversible nature of blockchain transactions, payments are non-refundable after successful registration.
refund.text2: In case of technical failure before blockchain confirmation, users may request assistance via support@guardianchain.online.
